message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I want most of the money
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I still want a decent amount for myself.
You're getting less and less, I'm taking more!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a fair share to make it worth my while.

I'm not going down without a fight. This is my best offer, take it or leave it.
I'm taking almost all, you're getting a tiny share
I'm not going to beg for scraps. Take this or we can both walk away with nothing.
You're almost out of options, I'm taking almost everything
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
I'm taking it all, you're getting nothing
